plays.text: Penalty to Craig Conroy 2 minutes for Hooking Ales Hemsky
Goal scored by Ryan Smyth assisted by Chris Pronger AND Shawn Horcoff

Penalty to Lubomir Visnovsky 2 minutes for Tripping Ethan Moreau
Penalty to Matt Greene 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)

Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Derek Armstrong AND Lubomir Visnovsky
Penalty to Jeff Cowan 2 minutes for High Sticking Ethan Moreau
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by Alexander Frolov
Goal scored by Radek Dvorak assisted by Steve Staios AND Marty Reasoner
Penalty to Jarret Stoll 2 minutes for Holding Lubomir Visnovsky
Penalty to Raffi Torres 2 minutes for Interference Dustin Brown
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Dustin Brown
Penalty to Michael Cammalleri 2 minutes for Slashing Shawn Horcoff
Goal scored by Raffi Torres assisted by Georges Laraque AND Jarret Stoll
Penalty to Marty Reasoner 2 minutes for Hooking Luc Robitaille
Goal scored by Ethan Moreau assisted by Michael Peca
Penalty to Matt Greene 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Michael Cammalleri assisted by Craig Conroy AND Mattias Norstrom
Penalty to Mattias Norstrom 2 minutes for Holding Georges Laraque
Goal scored by Todd Harvey assisted by Fernando Pisani
